targets.expr: count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod, container))

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", container!~"^(POD|)$", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}[1m])) by (pod, container)
